useCases.description: Which Apps / Service Principals exist, who owns them, what permissions/SSO they use, and which are ownerless or external.

useCases.name: Access governance
useCases.description: Who has access to what (users, groups, packages); review decisions, automate joiner/mover/leaver.

useCases.name: Device readiness
useCases.description: Managed/compliant status, join state, OS/version distribution, and stale or inactive devices.

useCases.name: Provenance and investigation
useCases.description: End‑to‑end telemetry (sign‑in, audit, provisioning, network), health alerts, and SLA/availability.

useCases.name: Optimize spending & hygiene
useCases.description: License counts/usage, unused or stale apps/groups, domain configuration and contacts.
